message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
I'm willing to be reasonable, but 60-40 isn't fair. How about we split the difference from your offer and go 55-45?
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bit more. How about 58-42?
Alice, we're running out of time.  58-42 is still too far from an even split.  Let's meet in the middle again at 53-47?
I'll try to meet you closer to the middle, but I still want a bit more. How about 57-43?
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. The money is losing value with every round. A 50/50 split is the only fair option at this point.
